casebody.data:
Shane G. SPEROW, Appellant
v.
Kevin RANSOM, Superintendent, S.C.I. Waymart, et al., and the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees No. 53 MAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Decided: April 26, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 26th day of April, 2019, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED .
